mapper.select: select * from study_participant order by study_participant_id desc
select * from study_participant order by study_participant_id desc LIMIT #{limit}
select * from study_participant where study_id = #{studyId} and member_id = #{memberId}
select p.study_participant_id, p.study_id, p.member_id, p.created_date, m.name from study_participant p left join member m on p.member_id = m.member_id where p.study_id = #{studyId} order by m.name
mapper.insert: insert into study_participant( study_id, member_id) values(#{studyId}, #{memberId})
mapper.delete: delete from study_participant WHERE study_id = #{studyId} and member_id = #{memberId}
